name: SlutCraft: Heat of the sperm
description:
SlutCraft: Heat of the sperm is a story about a space marine called Sarah Kerrigan, whose fate led her to a terrible betrayal by her comrades on Mengsk’s orders. Due to past mistakes, she is left to fight a whole swarm of Zerg on her own, completely abandoned. But she is ready to fight till the end.

Witness her journey of transformation from a loyal devoted soldier to a sexy Queen of Blades. Find secret events, get alternate endings, help Sarah make the right choices and pass every obstacle on her path, without losing her mind to pleasure. Remember, it’s all for a greater goal!
